code: import axios from"axios";var headers={"Content-Type":"application/json"};var burl="http://localhost:8800";export default{login:function login(email,password){return axios.post("".concat(burl,"/user/login"),{email:email,password:password},{headers:headers});},signup:function signup(send){return axios.post("".concat(burl,"/user/signup"),send,{headers:headers});},isAuth:function isAuth(){return localStorage.getItem("token")!==null;},logout:function logout(){localStorage.clear();}};
